refnamediv.refpurpose: Retrieves the parent class name for object or class

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If obj is an object, returns the name of the parent class of the class of which obj is an instance.
If obj is a string, returns the name of the parent class of the class with that name. This functionality was added in PHP 4.0.5.

example.title: Using get_parent_class
example.programlisting:
<?php

class dad {
    function dad() {
    // implements some logic
    }
}

class child extends dad {
    function child() {
        echo "I'm " , get_parent_class($this) , "'s son\n";
    }
}

class child2 extends dad {
    function child2() {
        echo "I'm " , get_parent_class('child2') , "'s son too\n";
    }
}

$foo = new child();
$bar = new child2();

?>
